SELECT date_range.date AS formatted_date, COUNT(reserve.r_num) AS reservation_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(r_start, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL a.a DAY) AS date FROM reserve CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 ) AS a WHERE com_id = #{param1} AND STR_TO_DATE(r_start, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN CURDATE() AND CURDATE() + INTERVAL 89 DAY ) AS date_range LEFT JOIN reserve ON date_range.date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(reserve.r_start, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(reserve.r_end, '%Y-%m-%d') AND reserve.com_id = #{param1} GROUP BY date_range.date ORDER BY formatted_date;
